rukus.text: DEUS EST UNUS created VOS INFIRMUS TUNC granted VOS POST MARASMUS strength TUNC substituted strength MARASMUS gray hair! He creates whatever He testimentum. He est Omniscient Omnipotent
(Feria when Hora advenit pass guilty testimentum juravit they extremum in hoc saeculum) unus unus hora! Est quam wrong they est
Those beatus knowledge faith dictus Vos extremum deus decretum Feria Resurrection! statim hoc est Feria Resurrection vos failed recognize it
Ergo non apology ut feria benefit transgressors nor testimentum they excused
Sic nos cited people in hoc Quran totus generis de examples. non matter quod generis de proof vos presens disbelievers they dictus Vos est falsifiers
DEUS SIC SIGILLUM hearts DE those NON know
Ergo vos steadfastly persevere - Pro deus promise est truth - Ac non intimidated de those non attained certainty
